summary: This standalone mod add a tanky follower specialized in one-handed combat and shield using. Multiple Hairstyles available. SeveNBase - UNP - UNPB- CBBE.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][b][size=5]Introduction[/size][/b][/color][/font]

Hello everyone !

English is not my native langage, im sorry for that.

Jahiya is a standalone follower that mean you dont need anything else to make her face and body like in my
screenshots. I highly recommend Facelight as always !

Also, Jahiya come with various hairstyles ! 4 hairstyles are available they are all in the images section and you can grab the one you like in the download section under Optional Tab. Four body type are available for the moment : SeveNBase - UNP - UNPB - CBBE. Some others may come later.

Special thanks to  [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/231130]Undying2006[/url][/b] for the fomod install! You can now install different hairstyles with NMM without any trouble, so again all thanks to him !


Jahiya is specialized in one-handed combat and shield using, she wear heavy armor for tanking tons of damages, she rely on her physically strength and hardy constitutions : she don't use fancy spells. You will find her in The Sleeping Giant Inn (Riverwood) or with optional .esp Frostfruit Inn (Rorikstead). I wanted her to be here in Riverwood but i know a lot of people have a lot of followers there, so i made Optional .ESPs for convenience.

She start only with an Iron Armor, an iron shield, and.. an iron sword :D That's all. She will lvl up with the player, i wanted her to be strong but still balanced maybe i'll have to do some more tweaks.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/F1tNWCy.png[/img][/center][b][font=Georgia][size=5][color=#a2c4c9]Character [/color][/size][/font][/b]

Jahiya is an adventurer from Hammerfell who have travelled all around tamriel, she's a kind hearted knight who fought for defend weak and poor people, she looks young but she's more a veteran than anything else.


[u][b]Basic Info[/b][/u]

Name : Jahiya

Level : Lvl up with player

Marriageable : Yes

Body : SeveNBase / UNP / UNPB / CBBE ( Height 0.98 - Weight 100 )

Location : Riverwood, Sleeping Giant Inn
[list][*][color=#d5a6bd]Optional location in download section : Frosfruit Inn, Rorikstead.[/color]
[/*]
[/list]
Default Outfit : 

- Iron Armor

- Iron Sword / Shield

[size=4][b]Perks[/b][/size] :

[u][b][i]One-Handed[/i][/b][/u]

- Armsman
- Fighting Stance
- Hack and Slash
- Bladesman
- Bone Breaker
- Critical Charge
- Savage Strike

[u][b][i]Block[/i][/b][/u]

- Shield Wall
- Deflect Arrow
- Power Bash
- Deadly Bash
- Disarming Bash
- Elemental Protection
- Block Runner
- Shield Charge

[i][b][u]Heavy Armor[/u][/b][/i]

- Juggernaut
- Well Fitted
- Tower of Strength
- Conditioning
- Matching Set
- Reflect Blows

[u][i][b]Alteration[/b]

[/i][/u]- Apprentice Alteration[u][i]
[/i][/u]- Magic Resistance[u][i]

[b]Sneak[/b][/i][/u]

- Light Foot

[center]
[color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=4][size=5]
Video[/size]

[/size][/font][/b][/color]
[color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=4]  [/size][/font][/b][font=Georgia][color=#ffffff][size=2]Thanks to [/size][/color][/font][b][font=Georgia][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url] [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4]

[youtube]gH_1hDfS-tw[/youtube]
[/size][/font][/b][/color][/center][center][youtube]8WFB_vKTr1c[/youtube] [youtube]wKnBlFaiS3I[/youtube][/center]
                  Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4575391/][b]MetalboyII[/b][/url]                                                                                                                           Thanks to [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/18752969]ModShowcase[/url][/b]                                                                                                                                    


[center]
[font=Georgia][color=#e69138][size=5][b]
Important Known Issues
[size=6]MUST READ [/size][/b][size=6] [/size]
[b][size=6]REEEEAAAAD[/size][/b]

[/size][/color][/font][size=2][b]
[/b][/size][size=2]First thing to do if Black Face : Use BOSS[/size] / LOOT[size=2] or move her esp to the bottom of load order.
Jahiya is one of my main character and i use her as a follower for a while now. I personally always used High 4K textures without a problem (and no i don't have a high-end PC), but some people seems to have issue like purple/black textures, so i added Medium Textures in download section under [b][color=#ffe599]Miscellaneous Tab[/color][/b]. Give it a try if you have purple/black textures body / face issues. THANKS.
There is also less high textures available than Medium if you have really really really low-end machines.
I did not already uploaded a Small textures version so if you want to do it yourself -[b][color=#d5a6bd]Not for CBBE users, only UNP(B) - SeveNBase[/color][/b]- download "[/size][size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000120412]V06 SMALL[/url][/b]" from [size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Here[/url][/b][/size] and then its fairly easy. You just have to navigate to :

[/size][/center][size=2][font=Georgia][color=#e69138]  [/color][/font]                                                                   Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\Textures\Actors\Character\Jahiya       


[/size][center][size=4][size=2]and then overwrite only 3 files, done.[/size][b]

[/b][size=2][i][b]Files to overwrite[/b][/i] :
femalebody_1.dds
femalehands_1.dds
femalehead.dds[/size][b]


[/b][/size][size=4][b][color=#ffe599]
Q&A[/color]

[/b][/size]
Q : I want to change her outfit but she keep the default one.
A : Use any of the follower overhaul mods (AFT, UFO...) or change it in CK.


Q : She doesn't look exactly like your screenshots in my skyrim.
A : Look at Mods recommended and Mods used in screenshots, it can be caused by your enb settings too.


Q : Is she custom voiced ?
A : No.[/center]

[color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]
Recommended Mods[/size][/font][/b][/color]

[/b][/url][color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]Last words[/size][/font][/b][/color]

Feel free to comment, add screenshots, ask questions or even giving me
constructive criticism. Let me know if there's any issue, please !

Have fun in Skyrim and happy holidays, cya !
